name: XmlNode

methods.name: addChildElement
methods.signature: public Dom.XmlNode addChildElement(String name, String namespace, String prefix)
methods.description: Creates a child element node for this node.

methods.name: addCommentNode
methods.description: Creates a child comment node for this node.

methods.name: addTextNode
methods.description: Creates a child text node for this node.

methods.name: getAttribute
methods.signature: public String getAttribute(String key, String keyNamespace)
methods.description: Returns namespacePrefix:attributeValue for the given key and key namespace.

methods.name: getAttributeCount
methods.description: Returns the number of attributes for this node.

methods.name: getAttributeKeyAt
methods.description: Returns the attribute key for the given index. Index values start at 0.

methods.name: getAttributeKeyNsAt
methods.description: Returns the attribute key namespace for the given index.

methods.name: getAttributeValue
methods.signature: public String getAttributeValue(String key, String keyNamespace)
methods.description: Returns the attribute value for the given key and key namespace.

methods.name: getAttributeValueNs
methods.signature: public String getAttributeValueNs(String key, String keyNamespace)
methods.description: Returns the attribute value namespace for the given key and key namespace.

methods.name: getChildElement
methods.signature: public Dom.XmlNode getChildElement(String name, String namespace)
methods.description: Returns the child element node for the node with the given name and namespace.

methods.name: getChildElements
methods.description: Returns the child element nodes for this node. This doesn't include child text or comment nodes.

methods.name: getChildren
methods.description: Returns the child nodes for this node. This includes all node types.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the element name.

methods.name: getNamespace
methods.description: Returns the namespace of the element.

methods.name: getNamespaceFor
methods.description: Returns the namespace of the element for the given prefix.

methods.name: getNodeType
methods.description: Returns the node type.

methods.name: getParent
methods.description: Returns the parent of this element.

methods.name: getPrefixFor
methods.description: Returns the prefix of the given namespace.

methods.name: getText
methods.description: Returns the text for this node.

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.signature: public Dom.XmlNode insertBefore(Dom.XmlNode newChild, Dom.XmlNode refChild)
methods.description: Inserts a new child node before the specified node.

methods.name: removeAttribute
methods.signature: public Boolean removeAttribute(String key, String keyNamespace)
methods.description: Removes the attribute with the given key and key namespace. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.

methods.name: removeChild
methods.description: Removes the given child node.

methods.name: setAttribute
methods.signature: public Void setAttribute(String key, String value)
methods.description: Sets the key attribute value.

methods.name: setAttributeNs
methods.signature: public Void setAttributeNs(String key, String value, String keyNamespace, String valueNamespace)
methods.description: Sets the key attribute value.

methods.name: setNamespace
methods.signature: public Void setNamespace(String prefix, String namespace)
methods.description: Sets the namespace for the given prefix.

description: Use the XmlNode class to work with a node in an XML document.
